caseTitle: Maulana Abdul Haque Baloch & others v. Government of Balochistan thr. Secy. Industries & Mineral Development & others
tagline: Balochistan and Federal Governments are directed to make a request to the International Council for Commercial Arbitration (ICCA) and International Centre for Settlement of Investment Disputes (ICSID) not to take any further steps in the arbitration proceedings and extend the period for nomination of arbitrator so that Supreme Court may finally dispose of the petitions filed before it on the same subject and matter.
